trans-unit.source: Provides custom binding management for components.
trans-unit.target: Gir administrasjon av egendefinerte bindingen for komponenter.

trans-unit.source: This interface allows component authors to provide their own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for components that will interact with the Windows Forms data-binding engine.
trans-unit.target: Dette grensesnittet gjør at komponenten forfattere kan angi sitt eget <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>for komponenter som skal kommunisere med Windows Forms databinding motoren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: It is rare for a component author to need to implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: Det er sjelden for en komponent Forfatter må implementerer dette grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class provides an example implementation of ICurrencyManagerProvider.
Note that for Smartphone applications, this class requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at for smarttelefon programmer denne klassen krever Windows Mobile versjon 5.0 programvare for smarttelefoner.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"></xref> and the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> for denne <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"> </xref> og det angitte datamedlemmet.

trans-unit.source: If `dataMember` is `null` or an empty string (""), GetRelatedCurrencyManager returns the main currency manager for this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>, which is the same currency manager returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.CurrencyManager%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `dataMember` er `null` eller en tom streng (""), GetRelatedCurrencyManager returnerer primære valuta behandleren for dette <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>, som er den samme valuta overordnet returnert fra den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.CurrencyManager%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.CurrencyManager%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the column or list, within the data source, to obtain the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kolonnen eller -listen i datakilden, for å hente den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> for.

trans-unit.source: The related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> obtained from this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"></xref> and the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: Den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> hentet fra dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"> </xref> og det angitte datamedlemmet.
